**Government Tender Announcement**

### Professional Cleaning Services for the Embassy of Canada to Mexico in Mexico City

**Reference Number**: cb-128-18544603

**Publication Date**: November 21, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**: December 23, 2024 14:00:00

**Job Title**: Request for Proposal for Professional Cleaning Services

The Embassy of Canada to Mexico is inviting qualified contractors to submit proposals for professional cleaning services for our main building and annex building in Mexico City. The scope of work includes:

* Regular cleaning of the main building (250,000 sqft) and its parking garage
* Maintenance and upkeep of the building and its facilities
* Cleaning of the annex building (150,000 sqft of office space and 100,000 sqft of parking garage)

Key Requirements:

* Must have experience providing professional cleaning services to large buildings
* Must have a team of trained and experienced cleaners
* Must have the necessary equipment and vehicles to complete the work
* Must have a good reputation and a proven track record of delivering quality services

**Tender Evaluation Criteria**: The proposals will be evaluated based on the contractor's technical merit and price. The successful contractor will be selected based on their ability to provide the required services at the best value to the government.

**Attachments**: The tender documents and specifications are available for download at [insert URL].

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: December 23, 2024 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: TBA
* Expected Contract End Date: TBA

### Contact Information

Nancy Levasseur
International Proposals
internationalproposals@international.gc.ca
343-203-0000

Note: The contact details and attachments are for the use of qualified contractors only. Please do not share with anyone else. Failure to do so may result in your bid being disqualified.  Make sure to follow any specific requirements stated in the attached documents.  Also, please note that the tender is open to all qualified contractors until the closing date, and we encourage all interested parties to submit their proposals.  We wish all participants a successful business relationship. Best regards.
---
April 30, 1967.
